In the heart of the ancient oak forest, a clever squirrel named Nutmeg discovered a hidden door beneath the roots of a gnarled tree. Curiosity piqued, she nudged it open to reveal a shimmering world filled with golden acorns and enchanted creatures. Each acorn granted a wish, but only to those pure of heart. Nutmeg shared her secret with her forest friends, teaching them the value of kindness. Together, they used their wishes to protect their home from storms and help lost animals. As the seasons changed, the forest thrived, and Nutmeg realized that sharing her secret was the greatest treasure of all.
